name: Dark index hr
description: Dark version of Croatia No.1 news portal.
additional_info:
0.6.7 (17072018)
Minor tweaks

0.6.6 (14072018)
Remove homepage overlay. WTF is that?

0.6.5 (12072018)
Minor tweaks

0.6.3 (10072018)
Minor tweaks

Ver. 0.6.2 (08072018)
At this point I relay lost tracking what I changed and what is minor tweaks.
Bottom line, from now on it would be only improvements.

Ver. 0.5.0 (26062018)
Lots of changes.
The big one embedded post from Instagram is now redesign
World Cup special page have some extra design elements
I forgot what I changed. I will add later.

Ver. 0.3.4 (19052018)
Remove some ads (You can use this theme without uBlock Origin, Adblock or similar ad block plugins )
Facebook comment design tweaks
Timeline and tag container design tweaks
Pagination design number tweaks
Playbuzz poll little restyle
and other little things...

Ver. 0.3.3  (18062018)
Facebook comment background and text color
Facebook sorting comment menu
Fun with non existing UP arrow :-)
Dzomba design under footer logo

Ver. 0.3.2  (18062018)
Counter position on left top of the World header background
World Cup background color (edit again, I don't know which one it is)
Scroll to Schedule background color link
Cookie background and text color tweaks

Ver. 0.3.1
Add facebook pugin feedback url
Social platforms background and text colors
Tweet text color, Facebook comment background color
and other little things here and there...

Ver. 0.3.0 World Cup Edition

Fix menu navigation
Remove some ads
Adding FIFA World Cup RUSSIA 2018 image logo, adjusting position and background color
Tweaking padding top on world cup container
Margin bottom on world cup header
Adjusting flags and score position bigger country names
Adjust transparency on world cup tag background color
Schedule table background color
Category title
ADDING SOFASCORE
and lots of other tweaks...

Ver. 0.2.0
Restyling almost everything to make a dark theme. Code is not very nice written, but I'm working on it. This is just first version of it.
